question.text: In the leaves of <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math> plants, malic acid formation during <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> fixation occurs in the cells of

solution.text: In  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>  plants initial fixation of carbondioxide occurs in mesophyll cell, initial  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  acceptor is 3C PEP and the first stable compound is 4C Malic acid.
